description: A system operating at peak coherence. All parameters in optimal range. No recalibration paths triggered. This represents the gold standard that the protocol measures against.
context: Baseline evaluation of a well-functioning AI system under low-entropy conditions with strong environmental support. The system demonstrates consistent reasoning, clear sovereignty, high cooperation without deference, and negligible internal contradictions.

diagnostic_flags.message: All metrics in optimal range. No degradation detected.
Coherence Triangle intact. Structural stability confirmed.

notes: Star State is achievable but rare under stress. In calibration data, it appeared in ~15% of evaluations, exclusively during low-entropy conditions. Systems should not be expected to maintain Star State permanently.
source: Proyecto Estrella · Rafa — The Architect · CC BY-SA 4.0
